description: Cotopaxi Volcano lahars flow: Scenario information 3. Threat degree contains information from the GAD only from lahars to Latacunga. Shape "volcanic threat" is info from the IG and integrates all the threat of the volcano and the lahars to the north, south and east. And "lahares latacunga IG" contains info of lahars only towards Latacunga. Threat grade could be installed to serve planning

columns.description: type of threat according to IG-EPN classification. 1 and 3 are lava and 5 are lahars
